query:
match p=(s:TA_Group)-[*1..5]->(t:Playbook)
where s.name = "FIN7"
return p
name: Playbooks that apply to FIN7 Tradecraft

query:
match p=shortestpath((s:TA_Group)-[*1..]->(t:SigmaRule))
where s.name = "FIN7" and t.name contains "MIMIKATZ"
return p
name: Sigma Rules detecting FIN7's usage of Mimikatz

query:
match p=shortestpath((s:TA_Group)-[*1..]->(t))
where s<>t and t.name contains "POTAM"
return s
name: List Threat Actors Known to use PetitPotam

query:
match p=(:Technique)-[:DetectedBy|TestedBy]->(x)
where x.name contains "MIMIKATZ"
return p
name: Detections and Test for Mimikatz
